docTitle.titlePart: Spurious Modes in Coaxial Transmission Line Filters *

byline.docAuthor: DOUGLAS E. MODEt, SENIOR MEMBER, IREl

front.div:
Summary-Coaxial transmission line filters in which the shunt
reactive elements are conducting rods inserted between the inner and
outer conductors of the series coaxial transmission line may be ana-
lyzed by the use of well-known transmission line equations if only the
TEM mode propagates. When other "spurious" modes are im-
portant, the problem is not so simple. Some equations are presented
for the cutoff frequencies of such spurious modes, and supporting ex-
perimental data is included.
